MAFINDO is an anti-hoax community that officially became a legal nonprofit organization in 2016. Currently, MAFINDO has more than 95,000 online members, over 1,000 volunteers, and more than 20 branches across Indonesia. MAFINDO also has a professional team to perform its tasks.

MAFINDO carries out various activities to combat infodemics / hoax epidemics, such as hoax busting, public education, seminars, discussions, advocacy to various parties, building various anti-hoax technologies, grassroot engagement, research, and more.

Certified internationally by the International Fact Checking Network (IFCN), MAFINDO has established collaborations with various communities, academics, other civil society organizations, community leaders, the United Nations (UN), the European Union (EU), the World Health Organization (WHO), the United Nations International Children's Emergency Fund (UNICEF), the Centers for Disease Control (CDC), Google, Facebook, and other parties.

All that MAFINDO and its network do is to contribute to building critical thinking in society.
